metadata.description: Discover FAB619, a leading engineering and design office specializing in electronics, robotics, and 3D printing. Innovative solutions for industries and professionals.

1.title: Welcome to FAB619 - On demand Fabrication
1.description: An engineering design office (EDO) specialized in advanced machinery, automation systems, and digital fabrication. From concept to prototype, we ensure efficient, tested solutions for  optimized for productivity, quality, and industrial scalability.

whoarewe.title:
Who

we are ?
whoarewe.l-description: We specialize <underline>in the design and development</underline> of <underline>custom machines</underline>, <underline>automation systems</underline>, and <underline>smart products</underline> that bridge the gap between innovation and industrial performance.
whoarewe.rt-description: Whether it's <underline>CNC custom machinery</underline>, <underline>IoT-enabled devices</underline>, <underline>PCB boards</underline>, <underline>Digital manufacturing</underline>  or <underline>workshops training programs</underline>, we deliver practical, scalable technologies that drive real-world impact and measurable results.
whoarewe.rb-description: Our multidisciplinary team brings together expertise in <underline>mechanical engineering</underline>, <underline>electronics</underline>, <underline>machine software</underline>, and <underline>digital fabrication</underline> to deliver end-to-end solutions—from concept and prototyping to production and integration.

card.title: Who We Are & What We Do
card.description-1: We are a dynamic engineering design office specializing in digital fabrication and custom machine design. Our team of experts combines innovative technologies with solutions to bring your ideas to life.
card.description-2: From CAD & CAM to 3D scanning, reverse engineering, and custom machine design, we offer comprehensive services to meet the diverse needs of our clients across various industries.

response.description: We provide a full range of digital fabrication and engineering services, including:
list: Custom Machines design and toolheads for industrial purposes
PCB design, IoT integration, and embedded systems
Training, workshops, and consulting for digital fabrication

faqList.question: 2. Do you develop custom solutions for specific industries?

response.text: Yes! We specialize in tailor-made solutions for industries like aerospace, nautical, furniture, education, and prototyping labs. We can design and build machines, control systems, or custom toolheads like our PelloBot extruder, based on your unique requirements.

faqList.question: 3. Can I request a custom machine or fabrication setup?

response.text: Absolutely. Our team works closely with you to understand your workflow, production goals, and constraints, then proposes a custom machine or system (gantry, robot arm, toolhead, etc.) built to your specs.

faqList.question: 4. How does your on-demand manufacturing service work?

response.text: You send us your 3D model or design brief, and we take care of the rest — from slicing and material prep to printing or machining. We offer rapid prototyping, small batch runs, and large-format prints with our own hardware.

Turnaround depends on the complexity and volume of your request. Prototypes are typically delivered within 3–7 working days, while custom machines or systems may take 2–6 weeks. We'll always provide an estimated delivery date upfront.

faqList.question: 6. Can I visit your workshop or schedule a consultation?

response.text: Yes! We welcome visits by appointment and offer both in-person and virtual consultations. Contact us to schedule a tour or meeting to explore how we can help.

faqList.question: 7. Do you provide training or workshops?

response.text: Yes, we offer hands-on workshops for 3D printing, CNC, machine building, and digital fabrication tools. We also provide custom training sessions for teams, schools, and technical centers.

We currently offer custom machines and kits primarily in Tunisia but are expanding our shipping and support network to serve international clients. Reach out to discuss delivery options for your region.
